siteMetadata.title: Verification: {{name}}
siteMetadata.description: This page verifies the significance and authenticity of the person that is presented on it.

safety.title: Safety
safety.subtitle: We take the safety of everyone online seriously. If the person you have contact with acts suspicious please report it to us immediately.

items.answerQuestions: Answer any questions you may have
items.getFeedback: Get feedback from you about interest or terms.

items.askForMoney: Ask for money transfers, or your credit card information
items.sendAnythingDangerous: Send you any software, or attachments, or ask you to install any program on your device

otherMembers.title: Other team members
otherMembers.subtitle: Our team works all week long to create a thriving community of content creators - feel free to contact any member to talk about the project.
